data.title: Elon Musk lists his three most important ingredients for AI
data.description: "You can make an AI go insane if you force it to believe things that aren't true because it will lead to conclusions that are also bad," Elon Musk said.
data.author: Sawdah Bhaimiya
data.keywords: Generative AI,Artificial intelligence,Business,Elon Musk,Technology,Breaking News: Technology,Elon Musk,Tesla Inc,business news
